channel.title: [718] error_game_js5connect
channel.description:
Okay so I've been staying up all night trying to do this and this is what I keep getting: [img]http://i.imgur.com/UtRjXH7.png[/img] It's the client side error 'error_game_js5connect' I've edited the loader.java and the client.java to the ip as '0.0.0.0' as I want to test the source myself as a friend made it for me and yeah... Do I have to change something server side or what?
-Thanks

item.title: [718] error_game_js5connect
item.dc:creator: @B0SS B0SS
item.description:
@B0SS wrote:

go in the loader.java
and change the sub_revision to sub_revision = 1 instead of 3

item.description:
@michael_5593 wrote:

Set it to local host ( 127.0.0.1)

also what client and source are you using?
